actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Northern Paiute Nation by the Indian Claims Commission in docket numbered 87.

summary.text: Provides for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Northern Paiute Nation of Nevada by the Indian Claims Commission in docket numbered 87.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Northern Paiute Nation by the Indian Claims Commission in docket numbered 87.
